newsitem.title: UK: Porterbrook makes 210 mln stg on Stagecoach shares.
newsitem.headline: Porterbrook makes 210 mln stg on Stagecoach shares.

text.p: UBS Ltd said on Friday that more than 28 million shares in Stagecoach Holdings Plc had been placed on behalf of former shareholders of Porterbrook Leasing Company MEBO Ltd for a total of 210 million stg.
The shares have been placed on behalf of former shareholders of Porterbrook, including funds managed by Chaterhouse Development Capital Ltd and associated co-investors.
